features: 3.0L inline 6-cylinder petrol engine with TwinPower Turbo
M Sport package with aerodynamic body styling
Adaptive air suspension with selectable drive modes
BMW Laserlight with adaptive LED headlights
12.3-inch digital instrument cluster and touchscreen infotainment
Gesture control and wireless Apple CarPlay/Android Auto
description: This 2021 BMW X7 xDrive40i M Sport in elegant White offers an extraordinary blend of commanding road presence and unmatched luxury. With 59,000 km on the odometer, this full-size SUV is ideal for those who demand performance, space, and cutting-edge technology in one premium package. Available now in Trivandrum.
